description.value:
Ninjas can evoke special mystic abilities through the use of Spirit and a combination of hand seals.  You learn these Mystic Seals over time, receiving Detonate upon taking this ability, and the others you gain the other Ninja abilities as specified in their descriptions:

 

Detonate

As a Minor Action you can spend 1 Spirit to imbue a piece of ammunition or a thrown weapon with the ability to explode on a successful strike, causing them to deal an extra 1d6 force damage to the target.  This enhancement lasts until used or the end of your next turn.  Whichever comes first.  The thrown weapon or ammunition used is destroyed in the process.

Alternatively, you can instead spend 1 Spirit as part of your Attack Action and make a finesse unarmed attack against a target.  On a success, the target takes 2d6 force damage from a small explosion originating at the point which you struck them, in addition to normal unarmed damage.  Should you have the ability to make more than one attack a turn, this ability only takes up one.  

 

Sudden Fog

Unlock: Received upon taking Run Like The Wind.

As an Action you can spend 1 Spirit to create a fog in your current space that has a 10 foot radius.  The fog heavily obscures the area it covers and allows you to immediately make a Dexterity (Stealth) check after it is created.  The fog lasts for 1 minute before dissipating.

 

Hide Below

Unlock: Received upon taking Shadow Walk.

This ability can be cast in two different ways: 

 

As an Action: you can spend 1 Spirit to sink into the ground beneath you, provided its solid stone, dirt, or sand.  The space you are sinking into must be large enough to fully contain your body.  

You are hidden beneath the ground giving you complete concealment.  While hidden you have 0 speed, have disadvantage on Dexterity (Save) checks, and can take no action other than resurfacing as a minor action.  You can still hear and discern through listening what is going on above you and can tell when a creature is within 10 feet of you.

After 1 minute of hiding in this way, you have the choice of spending 1 Spirit to stay hidden, or resurface as a minor action and take the rest of your turn.  Should you have 0 Spirit at the start of your turn while this ability is active, you immediately resurface.  

Should the space where you are hiding be destroyed, you surface immediately and are ejected 5 feet in a random direction.  If not possible, you simply surface immediately.  

 

Taking 10 Minutes: to use this ability causes it to act as it is described above with a couple exceptions:

  • You only have to spend 1 Spirit for the initial cast and for every 10 minutes you are hidden this way
  • You can hear up to 15 feet around you

 

Substitution

Unlock: Received upon taking Multiplicity.

As a reaction when you take damage, you can spend 1 Spirit to switch places with a Copy that you have created with Multiplicity.  The Copy must be within 60 feet to do so, and it takes the damage instead of you.

system.requirements: Must have the Rogue Starter Abilities
